title: The Standart Mail
subject: This is the first announcement of Standart Mail
content:
Hey how's it going? I'm here to introduce Standard Mail
a tool that will be native from now on in the software
and I will use it to make announcements to users
that's why I think it's important from time to time that you open your
computers to read these messages.
PS: I intend to bring first hand information here
